devdoc.author: David Lucid <david@rari.capital> (https://github.com/davidlucid)
devdoc.details: This library handles deposits to and withdrawals from Aave liquidity pools.

approve(address,uint256).details: Approves tokens to Aave without spending gas on every deposit.

params.amount: Amount of the specified token to approve to dYdX.
params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token.

deposit(address,uint256,uint16).details: Deposits funds to the Aave pool. Assumes that you have already approved >= the amount to Aave.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be deposited.
params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token to be deposited.

getBalance(address).details: Returns the fund's balance of the specified currency in the Aave pool.

params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Withdraws funds from the Aave pool.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be withdrawn.
params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token to be withdrawn.

withdrawAll(address).details: Withdraws all funds from the Aave pool.

params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token to be withdrawn.

devdoc.title: AavePoolController
